original_title: ตัวพ่อเรียกพ่อ
overview: 30-year-old Pong, a single father struggling to look after, and be a role model for, his 7-year-old daughter. Chaos ensues when Pong and his friends set out on a mission to find a rare Berryz Kobo concert ticket for his daughter.
tagline: The mission to get the ticket, before you are caught.
title: The One Ticket
